articles.title: DPRK-Russia Volleyball Friendly Held
articles.content:
DPRK-Russia Volleyball Friendly Held
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- A women's volleyball friendly took place between the April 25 team of the DPRK and the Abtodor-Metar team of Chelyabinsk City of Russia at the Volleyball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street from December 2 to 7.
					 Among the spectators were officials in the field of sports, sportspersons and staff members of the Russian embassy here.
					
					 The games provided a good occasion in making brisk sports exchange between the two countries and developing volleyball technique.

articles.title: Football Tournament for Osandok Prize Sports Contest
articles.content:
Football Tournament for Osandok Prize Sports Contest
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- The football event is included in the Osandok Prize Sports Contest, held in the DPRK in every December, from this year.
					 The premier football league for the Contest began at the May Day Stadium here on December 5.
					
					 It is unusual in the country to organize football matches in the contest and the inclusion of football event in the contest is aimed to raise the footballers' physical and technical level and help them gain more experience, an official concerned told KCNA.
					
					 Taking part in the premier league are 14 men's teams and 12 women's teams, among them men's teams of Ryongnamsan and Jebi and a women's team from the Ministry of Light Industry.
					
					 Rimyongsu defeated Amnokgang 2:0 in the first-day men's matches while Sobaeksu beat Amnokgang 4:2 in women's matches. The women's match between the Ministry of Light Industry and Kalmaegi teams ended in a draw 2:2.
					
					 The premier league will continue till December 24.
					
					 Meanwhile, the second-division football tournament for the Contest started at the Sosan Football Stadium on December 1.

articles.title: South Hwanghae Provincial Paduk Centre
articles.content:
South Hwanghae Provincial Paduk Centre
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- Teenagers from the South Hwanghae Provincial Paduk Centre proved successful at the national paduk contest held this year in the DPRK.
					 They won gold medals in men's and women's individuals and mixed doubles of the first division and a gold and silver in mixed doubles and women's individual of the second division with two of them honored with technical prize.
					
					 Experts say their successes are attributable to the peculiar training methods of the centre. In particular, the centre has paid deep attention to the training for considering the opponent's move, thus developing the intellectual faculties of young trainees. As part of the efforts to stimulate their intelligence and memory, it urges them to study mathematics and foreign languages.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Kim Jong Il's Love for People
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Kim Jong Il's Love for People
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- Love for the people was a motto leader Kim Jong Il and the core idea that characterized his brilliant revolutionary career.
					 Rodong Sinmun on Monday says this in an editorial.
					
					 The editorial goes on:
					
					 The long history of the harmonious whole of the Workers' Party of Korea and the people is shedding more brilliant rays along with the history of Kim Jong Il's love for the people.
					
					 Born as a son of the people and grown up among the working people, he cherished the noblest outlook on the people and fully applied it to his leadership over the revolution. Possessed of the noblest ideological and moral qualities as a leader, revolutionary and human being, Kim Jong Il made ceaseless journeys to show loving care for the people till the last moments of his life. 
					
					 Attaching importance to the people, respecting them and loving them--these were the basis and starting point of all his thoughts and practices. The people were the uppermost in his thinking and he pursued benevolent politics for the people and his personality was characterized by his noble popular traits.
					
					 Nobody was dearer than the people to him and he regarded it as his greatest duty to protect and glorify the destiny and dignity of the people.
					
					 His revolutionary career was the life of the tender-hearted father who dedicated himself to the happiness of the people and the life of the peerlessly great man who brought about epoch-making victories and changes by believing in the people and relying on them.
					
					 The editorial calls on all the service personnel and people to work harder to build a paradise for the people and the strongest power on this land, where the lifelong desire of the leader has become a reality, under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Pomminryon South Headquarters Calls for Staging Pro-Reunification Patriotic Action
articles.content:
Pomminryon South Headquarters Calls for Staging Pro-Reunification Patriotic Action
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) held a meeting in Kyonggi Province on Nov. 28 calling for vigorously staging the pro-reunification patriotic action on the occasion of the 25th anniversary of the formation of Pomminryon, according to the south Korean Internet paper Thongil News. 
					 Ri Kyu Jae, chairman of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon, said that the "yusin" dictatorship was revived in south Korea and legitimate activities for peace and reunification are labeled "enemy-benefiting" and "illegal" to be victims of the security law.
					
					 Noting that the prevailing situation is calling for strengthening Pomminryon, he underscored the need to make positive efforts to unite broad strata of people aspiring after independence and patriotism under the banner of solidarity among Koreans in the south, the north and abroad.
					
					 Ri Chang Bok, permanent representative of the South Side Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration, deplored that the south, the north and abroad failed to jointly commemorate the 15th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration and the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation owing to the present regime's behavior. 
					
					 He called for conducting massive movement to frustrate the moves of the U.S. and Japan to incite confrontation between compatriots in the north and the south, and establish a peace-keeping mechanism

articles.title: U.S. Steps up Arms Build-up for War of Aggression
articles.content:
U.S. Steps up Arms Build-up for War of Aggression
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is mulling deploying on a rotation basis in south Korea more than 4,500 troops of the first cavalry brigade belonging to its first cavalry division in Texas.
					 This is part of its arms build-up for rounding off the preparations for a war of aggression on the Korean Peninsula by ensuring "strategic flexibility" of its forces in south Korea.

Brief Biography of Kim Jong Il Posted by Serbian Party on Its Website

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Malaysia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Malaysia
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated with due ceremony in Malaysia on December 1.
					 Chong Ching Chee, managing director of the Tombo Enterprise Company, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events such as lecture, photo exhibition and film show to praise the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il in the period between December 1 and 20.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed Abroad
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- Events were held in different countries in the period between November 28 and December 1 on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They included a reading session on his work in Mexico, an opening ceremony of Korean photo, book and art exhibition in Peru, a film show in Algeria and a photo exhibition in Slovenia.
					
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos dealing with the exploits of Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, books and photos introducing the history of victory and glory of the DPRK and art pieces associated with the wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Participants in the film show watched the Korean film "Masikryong Ski Resort".
					
					 Present at the events were personages of various circles of the relevant countries and the masses.
					
					 The chairman of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said that Kim Jong Il frustrated all sorts of challenges and aggressive moves of the imperialists, defended socialism and ushered in a new era for building a thriving nation with his Songun politics.
					
					 The president of the Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union noted that Kim Jong Il was a great man as he turned the DPRK into a powerful state standing firmly against the U.S.
					
					 An official of the General Union of the Algerian Workers praised Kim Jong Il as great statesman and strategist who turned the DPRK into a nuclear weapons state and provided a firm foundation for building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Revolutionary Career Praised in Hong Kong, China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Revolutionary Career Praised in Hong Kong, China
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- The November issue of International Link, a magazine of Hong Kong, China, carried a special write-up on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 It edited articles under several titles accompanied by a photo of smiling Kim Jong Il and photos dealing with the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 In an article titled "4th anniversary of demise of Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il" the magazine said that four years since his demise were the days of boundless yearning of the Korean people for Kim Jong Il and ones of noble moral obligation.
					
					 It stressed that the Korean people held Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and have further glorified his exploits.
					
					 The magazine in an article titled "Life for the future" noted that Kim Jong Il devoted his all to the prosperity of the country true to the intention of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 For the future!
					
					 This represents ardent patriotism that ran through the life of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 His life serves as one of devotion to the country and people.
					
					 He will live forever in the hearts of not only the Korean people but progressive mankind as he devoted his all to the bright future of the country and people.

articles.title: Competencia de amistad de voleibol entre equipos de RPDC y Rusia
articles.content:
Competencia de amistad de voleibol entre equipos de RPDC y Rusia
Pyongyang, 7 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar del dia 2 al 7 en el Centro de Voleibol de la capitalina Avenida Chongchun el torneo de amistad de voleibol entre el equipo femenino 25 de Abril de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el Abtodor-Metar de la ciudad de Chelyabinsk de Rusia.
					Lo vieron los funcionarios de la rama de deporte, los deportistas y los miembros de la sede diplomatica rusa en Corea.
					
					La competencia sirvio de un buen motivo en realizar activamente el intercambio deportivo entre los dos paises y desarrollar la tecnica de voleibol.

articles.title: Incluye torneo de futbol en Competencia Deportiva por Premio Osandok
articles.content:
Incluye torneo de futbol en Competencia Deportiva por Premio Osandok 
Pyongyang, 7 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Desde este ano el torneo de futbol se incluye en las disciplinas de la Competencia Deportiva por el Premio Osandok, que se efectua cada ano en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					El dia 5 en el capitalino Estadio Primero de Mayo se inicio el torneo de futbol de la categoria A en el marco de esta competencia.
					
					Un relacionado dijo a la ACNC que el objetivo de la organizacion de futbol es para elevar el nivel fisico y tecnico de los jugadores y adquirir mayores experiencias.
					
					En la competencia participan 14 equipos masculinos y 12 femeninos de futbol.
					
					En el partido masculino del primer dia, el equipo Ri Myong Su vencio a su rival Amnokgang por 2:0, mientras el equipo femenino Sobaeksu doblego a su contraparte Amnokgang por 4:2. 
					
					El once femenino del Ministerio de Industria Ligera y el otro Kalmaegi se empataron por 2:2.
					
					El torneo de la categoria A de futbol continua hasta el dia 24 con el metodo de todos contra todos y de knock-out.
					
					Por otra parte, el torneo de futbol de la categoria B se realiza desde el dia primero en el Campo de Futbol de Sosan.

articles.title: Autoridades surcoreanas no podran doblegar a RPDC, apunta Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Autoridades surcoreanas no podran doblegar a RPDC, apunta Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 7 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En su viaje a Europa la mandataria surcoreana volvio a solicitar a las fuerzas extranjeras la "colaboracion en la solucion del problema nuclear del Norte de Corea". 
					Por otra parte, las autoridades surcoreanas se precipitan por convocar las conversaciones de delegados jefes a la cita de 6 bandas con sus amos norteamericano y japones para la "colaboracion anti-Norte". 
					
					Pese a tales obstinadas actividades mendigantes las autoridades surcoreanas no obtuvieron nada. 
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 6 y continua:
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas, que recurren freneticamente a las maniobras de provocacion de guerra nuclear en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras, no tienen la calidad de hablar de la "renuncia nuclear del Norte". 
					
					Antes de pedir la "colaboracion anti-Norte" a las fuerzas extranjeras, deben parar las acciones provocativas que agravan la tension de la Peninsula Coreana y aumentan el peligro de guerra nuclear en adhesion a la amenaza nuclear anti-RPDC de EE.UU. 
					
					Cuanto mas la mandataria surcoreana intensifique la confabulacion con las fuerzas extranjeras persiguiendo la ambicion malintencionada, tanto mas se entenebrece la perspectiva de la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y se agravan la confrontacion y la tension. 
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas no pueden doblegar a la RPDC con la intensificacion de la "colaboracion" con las fuerzas extranjeras.
